copy_all_from_map_deprecated.title: Update your `copy_all_from` configuration
copy_all_from_map_deprecated.description:
The `copy_all_from` option in your `family_calendar_sync` configuration is still using the **old YAML map format**.

### ❌ Deprecated format (old)
```yaml
copy_all_from:
  entity_id: calendar.parent_calendar
```

### ✅ New required format (list)
```yaml
copy_all_from:
  - calendar.parent_calendar
  - calendar.another_parent
```

The old map format will stop working in a future release.

Update your `configuration.yaml` to the new list format to prevent sync failures.
